title: Wind Walk
content:
Wind Walk Level 6 Transmutation Spell Transform yourself and all nearby party members into tiny clouds of mist to avoid attacks. You become Resistant to non-magical damage, gain Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity and Strength Saving Throws, and become tiny in size. Level 6 Transmutation Spell

Transform yourself and all nearby party members into tiny clouds of mist to avoid attacks.

You become Resistant to non-magical damage, gain Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity and Strength Saving Throws, and become tiny in size.

While transformed, you won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk.

Wind Walk is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Wind Walk is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
